(Name):N/AProfession:British-American Internet entrepreneurNet Worth in 2024:$1.5 millionLast Updated:July 2024

Jimmy Wales is an American internet entrepreneur who co-founded Wikipedia. He serves as Wikia, Inc.âs president and is also a member of the Wikimedia Foundation. Wales is a board member of several other groups like Guardian Media Group, Creative Commons Sunlight Foundation, and MIT Center for Collective Intelligence. He has received many honors in his career and has appeared in the list of â100 Most Influential People in the Worldâ by Time magazine.

Maybe you know about Jimmy Wales very well But do you know how old and tall is he, and what is his net worth in 2024? If you do not know, We have prepared this article about details of Jimmy Walesâs short biography-wiki, career, professional life, personal life, todayâs net worth, age, height, weight, and more facts. Well, if youâre ready, letâs start.

Early Life

Jimmy Donal Wales is the son of Jimmy Wales and Doris Ann. He was born in Alabamaâs Huntsville on 7 August 1966. The date of birth on his birth certificate appears on 8 August 1966.

He completed his schooling at Randolph School. He has got his bachelorâs degree from Auburn University in 1986. Later he earned his masterâs degree from the University of Alabama. He has also been to Indiana University for his Ph.D.

Personal Life

Jimmy Wales was first married to Pamela Green. They divorced in 1993. From 1997 to 1998, he was married to Christine Rohan. The couple had a daughter. In 2012, he married Kate Garvey. They are the parents of two daughters. Wales has also dated Rachel Marsden.

Wales currently lives in London, England, and is an atheist. Form a very young age, he was attracted to the internet, and this made him have a career as an internet entrepreneur.

Age, Height, and Weight

Being born on 7 August 1966, Jimmy Wales is 57 years old as of todayâs date 20th July 2024. His height is 1.68 m tall, and his weight is 75 kg.

Career

Jimmy Wales started his career by working for Chicago Options Associates in 1994. In 1995, after the success of Netscapeâs IPO, he founded Bomis with his partners. In 2001, he teamed up with Larry Sanger to launch Wikipedia.

Officially, it was named as Nupedia, but it happened to be dubbed as Wikipedia. It was also aimed to be a financial company; they made it a nonprofit portal. There have been many controversies regarding his role as one of the founders of Wikipedia. In 2003, Wales created the Wikimedia Foundation.

In 2008, he was accused of misusing the funds of the Wikimedia Foundation in 2008. He is also the founder of Wikia, which is a wiki farm. It was reported that it was in the co-chair of the mobile phone network, The Peopleâs Operator, in 2014.

He is also an author and has written or co-written several books. Additionally, Jimmy Wales has addressed several conferences around the world. He was also on the co-chair of the World Economic Forum in 2008. It was in the Middle East.

Awards & Achievements

Jimmy Wales is the recipient of the UK Tech4Good Awards 2014. In the same year, he went on to win the Mohammed bin Rashid Knowledge Award. He had also been bestowed with the honorary citizenship of Esino Lario in 2016. In 2017, he received the British Academyâs Presidentâs Medal. Other awards won by him are Leonardo European Corporate Learning Award, Gottlieb Duttweiler Prize, Pioneer Award, Business Process Award, Nokia Foundation annual award, and Global Brand Icon of the Year Award.

Net Worth & Salary of Jimmy Wales in 2024

Jimmy Wales has an estimated net worth of more than $1.5 million as of July 2024. The internet entrepreneur found immense success by becoming a co-founder of Wikipedia. He has received various honors and has also been bestowed with several honorary doctorates by various universities. He has been on the board of multiple organizations and has also chaired or co-chaired several groups. He also successfully founded Wikia, which is a wiki hosting is service is for-profit. His prize money was $1 million as the winner of the David Dan Prize.

Jimmy Wales is one of the most renowned internet entrepreneurs in the world. Today the world is thankful to provide his service and bringing up Wikipedia. He has helped many by providing information and knowledge through Wikipedia. Wales has appeared in the list of several magazines for his popularity.
